element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.SetGridAndChild
element.short: Set datasource connection of main and detail grids.

descr.p: Sets the tab caption, main dataset, default data sorting, detail tabs, and contextual menu and button visibility for each module.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.SetGridColumns
element.short: Set columns' properties of a grid.

descr.p: aTable is the TTableType of the target table.
aGrid is the target TDBGrid.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.SetSearchBar
element.short: Set the search bar visible or not.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.SetSidePanel
element.short: Set the (right) side panel visible or not.

descr.p: aValue is the new value for side panel visibility.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.SetSideIndex
element.short: Set the active tab index of the side panel.

descr.p: aValue is the new value for the side panel index.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.LoadRecordColumns
element.short: Loads the column names in the record view side panel.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.UpdateFilterPanels
element.short: Set visibility of filter panels for the current table type.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.AddGridColumns
element.short: Adds the columns of a table into a TDBGrid
element.descr: It only adds visible columns and set the columns' properties using .

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.AddSortedField
element.short: Adds a field to the sorting list

descr.p: aFieldName is the name of the field to sort.
aDirection is the direction of the sorting: sdAscending or sdDescending.
aCollation indicates the database collation to use.
isAnAlias indicates if the field needs to prefixed by the table name, if False.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.ClearSearch
element.short: Use this method to reset the quick filters

descr.p: It clears the quick filters and related controls. While doing it, FCanToggle is False and changed to True at the end of the process.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.GetFilters
element.short: Use this method to get the filter parameters of a search

descr.p: While running it, the FCanToggle is False and changed to True at the end of the process.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.LoadRecordRow
element.short: Loads the record data from the selected row to the record view side panel.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.Search
element.short: Use this method to run a search or filter.

descr.p: aValue is the value to be searched.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.SetSearchString
element.short: Sets the SearchString property.

descr.p: aValue is the new value for the SearchString.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.SearchString
element.short: String containing a typed search value

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.ApplyDarkMode
element.short: Apply the dark mode to the UI

descr.p: It sets the TBCPanels colors and images to the dark theme.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.CellKeyPress
element.short: Capture the key press event within specific column cells

descr.p: It captures the key press in a specific cell and calls a find dialog or clears the cell.
Sender is the object that called the method.
Key is the key that was pressed.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.ChildTagClick
element.short: Behavior of child tags click event

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.ChildTagMouseEnter
element.short: Behavior of child tags when mouse enter event

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.ChildTagMouseLeave
element.short: Behavior of child tags when mouse leave event

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.GetChildDataSet
element.short: Get the current detail dataset

descr.p: It returns the detail TDataSet based on FTableType and the nbPages.PageIndex.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.GetColumns
element.short: Fill the columns grid on side panel with the dataset fields

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.LoadColumns
element.short: Load the columns' saved settings

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.RefreshMap
element.short: Update the map with the current record coordinates

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.RefreshMapSurvey
element.short: Update the map with the coordinates of mistnets of the current survey record

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.SaveColumns
element.short: Save columns' settings

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.SetAudios
element.short: Set the dataset and grid of audio recordings side panel.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.SetImages
element.short: Set the dataset and grid of the images side panel.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.SetRecycle
element.short: Set the dataset and grid of the recycle bin side panel.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.Summary
element.short: Set the dataset of the summary side panel.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.UpdateButtons
element.short: Update the state of the main buttons

descr.p: It updates the state of the buttons and menus for the main table.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.UpdateChildBar
element.short: Update the child bar state
element.descr: It updates the state of the buttons and menus for the current detail tab.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.UpdateChildButtons
element.short: Update the detail buttons state
element.descr: It updates the state of detail buttons and menus.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.UpdateChildCount
element.short: Update the detail records counter badges
element.descr: It updates the counter badges of each detail tab with the number of records.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.UpdateChildStatus
element.short: Update the child status bar
element.descr: It updates the record counts for the current detail table.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.UpdateGridTitles
element.short: Update the grid columns titles with sorting indication.

descr.p: It adds an up (descending sorting) or down (ascending sorintg) arrow on the titles of sorted columns.
aGrid is the target TDBGrid.
aSearch is the TCustomSearch with the sorting parameters.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.UpdateImageButtons
element.short: Update the images side panel buttons.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.UpdateAudioButtons
element.short: Update the audio recordings side panel buttons

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.TableType
element.short: Table type of the master datasource

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.ShowSidePanel
element.short: Update the visibility of the side panel

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.SidePanelIndex
element.short: Change the side panel page index

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.CanToggle
element.short: Variable that indicates if the filters can change

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.SetDocs
element.short: Set the dataset and grid of the documents side panel.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.UpdateChildRightPanel
element.short: Update the detail right panel
element.descr: It updates the current project budget and rubric balances in the detail right panel.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.UpdateDocButtons
element.short: Update the documents side panel buttons

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.UpdateRecycleButtons
element.short: Update the recycle bin side panel buttons

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.ChildTable
element.short: Table type of the current child datasource

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.SaveColumnsConfig
element.short: Save the settings for grid columns

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.QuickAddChild
element.short: Setup behavior of quick add field on detail toolbar.

descr.p: aInitialValue is the key typed to activate the method.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.OpenAsync
element.short: Setup and open datasets after show window

descr.p: Speed up the window showing to the user.
To be used with a TTimer.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.LoadColumnsConfigGrid
element.short: Load data in the columns grid side panel

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.LoadColumnsConfig
element.short: Load and setup the grid columns settings from file.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.AddDocument
element.short: Add new document to the database

descr.p: aDataSet is the documents target TDataSet.
aFileName is the file path for the document.
aAttachment is the record with foreign keys to which the document is associated.
It extracts the file creation date and time to fill the record.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.AddAudio
element.short: Add new audio recording to the database

descr.p: aDataSet is the audio recordings target TDataSet.
aFileName is the file path for the audio recording.
aAttachment is the record with foreign keys to which the audio recording is associated.
It extracts the file creation date and time to fill the record.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.CreatePanelTabs
element.short: Setup detail tabs

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.PanelTabs
element.short: List of detail tabs

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.FSearch
element.short: Search parameters
element.descr: Stores the current search parameters, including quick filters and search box values. It also defines the data sorting.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.FCanToggle
element.short: Determine when a control can be clicked or toggled
element.descr: If True, it indicates that the controls can be clicked or toggled, otherwise is False.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.FIsResizing
element.short: Determine when a column is resizing

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.FIsMoving
element.short: Determine when a column is moving

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.FSidePanelFactor
element.short: Calculated size factor for (right) side panel

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.FChildPanelFactor
element.short: Calculated size factor for detail bottom panel

element.name: TCustomPanelTab
element.short: Custom type for the detail tabs

element.name: TCustomPanelTab.Create
element.short: Create and show a new detail tab

element.name: TCustomPanelTab.UpdateCounter
element.short: Update the counter badge in the detail tab

element.name: TCustomPanelTab.PageIndex
element.short: Index of the detail tab position

element.name: TCustomPanelTab.IsActive
element.short: Determine if the detail tab is active

element.name: TStringMemoEditor
element.short: Custom type to show a memo when editing a text field in DBGrid

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.FTableType
element.short: Main table type
element.descr: Specifies which table to use in this form.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.FChildTable
element.short: Current related detail table type

descr.p: Specifies which is the current detail table being used.
If the module does not have related tables, it is set to tbNone.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.FSearchString
element.short: Stores the string input on the search box.
element.descr: The input of search strings is done in the search box of the . It is stored in this variable to update the search box when alternating between instances of this form.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.oldSearchString
element.short: Stores the previous value of FSearchString
element.descr: Used to check if the value changed.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.UpdateRowHeights
element.short: Update the default row height of all grids in the form.

descr.p: It gets the row height value from

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.AddOrEditChild
element.short: Open the edit dialog for add or edit a record of the specified table type.

descr.p: aTableType is the table where to add or edit the record.
isNew indicates to open the edit dialog in insert mode if True, otherwise in edit mode.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.AttachMediaDlg
element.short: Show dialog to attach media or document files to data records.

descr.p: Displays the media attachment dialog for the current module and returns a TMediaAttachment record with foreign keys populated according to the specified table type.

This method creates and shows the TdlgAttachMedia dialog, initializes its fields based on the active dataset for the given aTableType, and if the user confirms the operation (ShowModal = mrOK), it returns a TMediaAttachment structure containing the related identifiers such as author, locality, taxon, individual, capture, feather, expedition, survey, sighting, nest, nest revision, egg, specimen, project, permit, sampling plot, and method.
aTableType The table type (TTableType) representing the current module. Determines which foreign keys are set in the attachment.
Returns a TMediaAttachment record with identifiers associated with the selected record in the module. If the user cancels the dialog, the returned record remains uninitialized.

element.name: TfrmCustomGrid.AddVideo
element.short: Add new video recording to the database.

descr.p: aDataSet is the video recordings target TDataSet.
aFileName is the file path for the video recording.
aAttachment is the record with foreign keys to which the video is associated. It extracts the file creation date and time to fill the record.
